glossentry.glossterm: return on plan assets (of an employee benefit plan)

glossdef.p: Interest, dividends and other revenue derived from the plan assets, together with realised and unrealised gains or losses on the plan assets, less:

li.p: any cost of managing plan assets; and
any tax payable by the plan itself, other than tax included in the actuarial assumptions used to measure the present value of the defined benefit obligation.
